medical_history.chief_complaint: Patient presenting with hematemesis after alcohol consumption.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reports that after drinking approximately 1 pint of vodka, he experienced retching and subsequent episodes of bloody vomiting. He vomited blood 3 times 2 days ago, 2 times the day before presentation, and once this morning prior to presenting to the emergency department. Associated epigastric pain was noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Asthma, OSA on CPAP, Dyslipidemia, Hypertension, Cholelithiasis, back pain, Knee pain, Lactose intolerance, history of right arm fracture.
medical_history.family_history: Family history is noted for mother living with diabetes, asthma, arthritis, and obesity; siblings with obesity.
